quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Verify whether the image accurately reflects the keychain being a close-up shot.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the image showing a close-up view of the keychain?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Confirm whether the keychain is correctly rendered in soft rubber material with the appropriate outlines.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the keychain appear to be made of soft rubber with bold black outlines?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Ensure the chibi-style character matches the design from the attached image.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the keychain feature a chibi-style representation of the character shown in the attached image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Check if the keychain is properly attached to a small silver keyring as instructed.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the keychain attached to a small silver keyring?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Evaluate if the background is kept neutral without unnecessary elements.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the background of the image neutral, without any distracting elements?
